es.eucm.eadandroid.common.data.adventure
Class AdventureData

java.lang.Object
  es.eucm.eadandroid.common.data.adventure.DescriptorData
      es.eucm.eadandroid.common.data.adventure.AdventureData
All Implemented Interfaces:
Described, Titled, Cloneable
public class AdventureData
extends DescriptorData

Represents the whole data of an adventure game. This includes: Descriptor Information (adventure title, description, path of each chapter, adaptation & assessment configuration, gui configuration) List of Chapters List of AssessmentProfiles List of AdaptationProfiles

Author:
Javier
